attributes.action: reject the idea of paying the taliban
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: we should not pay the taliban for laying down their arms, this would not only encourage the law abiding to go and fight for them and then change sides, it would encourage the taliban to plant people amongst the population saying they change sides when they had;nt so who would know who was genuine,this is the daftest idea you and the aphganistan goverment have had and i say scrap it before you create more trouble for yourselves.
